chapters.summary: Mike is looking to lose 40 kilos and wants to get down to 90 kilos. Why is he trying to lose weight and what does it give him? I need to do it from the point of view of health.
chapters.headline: Mike is looking to lose 40 kilos through weight loss programs

chapters.summary: We specialize and focus only on helping guys over 40 with weight loss, fitness and improvement of health. We break into three key areas: training, nutrition and accountability. Ultimately what we're putting this down to is longevity of life and quality of life.
chapters.headline: Mike is helping men over 40 with weight loss, fitness and improvement of health

chapters.summary: You can either come and do our six week transformation program, which is £199, or you can go straight into our monthly program. The million dollar question for me then is when.
